attributes.action: build auxillary roads that run parallel to motorways so as to keep traffic moving when an accident occurs and only used for this purpose in an emergency.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To build auxillary roads that run parallel to motorways, each beginning and ending at each junction or exit. These roads would be used in an emergency as a diversion between junctions, so keeping traffic moving when an accident occurs between two motorway junctions and only used for this purpose. These roads would also allow the emergency services to gain effective access too instead of struggling to get through miles of standing traffic.
